page.title: 05Schools Sports Day.
page.content: For our{Infants Annual Sports Day in Bellfield Primary School lots of parents turned out to watch and some helped. The races included the sack race,Charlie Chaplin race, flat race and a dressing up race. Our four teams are represented by four colours, and are named after{Scottish Lochs. Yellow {-Lomond, Blue-Brora, Green-Katrine, {Red-Rannoch.}Our{Senior Sports Day included similar races with the addition of team events, eg. relay, netball race, and football dribble.We also had a slow cycle race for both boys and girls. During the day crisps and lemonade etc., were sold. {The results were:- {1st yellow-285 2nd Green-231 {3rd Red-225 4th-Blue-208 {The Girls Champion was Di-an Potter. {The Boys Champion was James Ferguson.
